entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning then changing to wet snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
